CustomField.description: User Story # 164369. This field is for capturing the No. Of Days that we need to back track to pick records accordingly related to Program Enrollments and Relationships during the respective Batch Job executions.The value must be a negative value to be keyed in this field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter a negative value say "-1" to pick records updated in the last 1 day's time. "-2" will imply records that were updated in the last 2 days time interval.
CustomField.label: Days
